ObjectClass.Name: Armory
ObjectClass.Description:
ARMORY:
Performs tech tree upgrades
Produces the following units: MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Create Marines
Objective.Details: Slow ground biological foot soldier\Builds basic structures\Powerful in large groups\Splash damage weapon (upgradable)\[ Weapon ] Ground: 55 (+13) Air: 55 (+13)

Objective.Name: Create SOPs
Objective.Details: Slow ground biological foot soldier\Detects cloaked units\Heals biological units\Clears nanite infection\[ Weapon ] Ground: 86 Air: 31

Objective.Name: Upgrade Ground Units
Objective.Details: \Upgrades MARINE and MECH weapons\Allows TURRET weapon upgrade\Allows the HEAVY TANK upgrade\Allows two MARs to merge

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials
Objective.Details: \Enables special abilities:\ TSS and Nanite Infect

Objective.Name: Upgrade Gate Tech
Objective.Details: \Allows MECHs to build:\ Teleporters, Chronoporters and\ Slingshots

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace
Objective.Details: \Upgrades LANCER and TORNADE\weapons\Allows nukes for HEAVY CRUISERS

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace
Objective.Details: \Upgrade Aerospace\ Not available\ Requires the Machinery upgrade
